panels.title: Welcome
panels.content:
Welcome to Kibana Dashboard, a technology preview of what's to come for Kibana, Logstash and Elasticsearch 

Kibana dashboard is the easy way to share, build, use and extend interactive, real time dashboards and data analysis interfaces. 

Ready to get started? 

Logstash users, click the 'Load' button to the right, paste this URL:  https://gist.github.com/anonymous/e99d94a426956c45a288 into the 'Gist' loader, click 'Get' and select the 'Logstash Dashboard' link that appears
